summary: As a prison guard in my 20s, I came to know men convicted of murder and later became an anti-death penalty activist
title: The Murderers I Have Known

summary: A good—long, complex—analysis of the EU’s new Cyber Resilience Act.
title: An Analysis of the EU’s Cyber Resilience Act

summary:
I mentioned a while ago that I wanted a way to filter Podcasts into multiple separate feeds based on their content.  The tool I mention in the previous post, SiftRSS is pretty good, but the only thing it doesn’t currently do is let you change the name of the feed, which means I end up with several feeds with identical names. 
So, I made my own: Baleen...
title: Filter RSS/Podcast feeds

summary:
Editor-in-Chief Gerald Lynch breaks the bad news in ‘One More Thing… Goodbye from iMore’:

Dig out your old iPod and fire up your ‘Songs to cry to’ playlist, I come bearing sad news.  After more than 15 years covering everything Apple, it’s with a heavy heart I announce that we will no longer be publishing new content on iMore. 
I want to kick off by thanking you all for your support over the many years and incarnations of the site...
title: Farewell, iMore
